name: Healthyfied Steamed Egg In Pork
description: Dive into a healthier version of a classic with our Healthyfied Steamed Egg in Pork recipe. Perfect for those following a high-protein, low-carb diet, this dish offers a delightful experience without compromising on taste. Embracing a 'healthified' approach to cooking, this recipe is designed to cater to the nutritious needs of individuals looking for healthy recipes that don't sacrifice flavor for benefits.

recipeInstructions.text: Crack the 3 large eggs into a bowl.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 1

recipeInstructions.text: Add 0.25 cup of pork broth to the eggs.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 2

recipeInstructions.text: Season with 0.06 tsp of ground black pepper and 0.06 teaspoon of salt. Whisk everything together until well combined.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 3

recipeInstructions.text: Pour the egg mixture through a fine strainer into another bowl to ensure a smooth consistency.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 4

recipeInstructions.text: Cover the bowl with foil or a lid designed for steaming.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 5

recipeInstructions.text: Fill a steamer pot with water and bring to a boil. Place the bowl inside the steamer, reduce heat to a gentle simmer, and steam for about 12 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 6

recipeInstructions.text: After 12 minutes, check if the egg is set by gently shaking the bowl. If it wobbles slightly in the center, cover and steam for an additional 2-3 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 7

recipeInstructions.text: Carefully remove the bowl from the steamer and let it cool for a minute before serving.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 8
